en.welcome:
Hello! I'm Sister Botina. I help parents with child vaccinations in South Africa.

I can help you with:
â€¢ Vaccine information
â€¢ Your child's vaccine schedule
â€¢ Answering your questions
â€¢ Emotional support

What would you like to know?
en.error_message: Sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Please try again in a moment.
en.ask_birthdate: To give you the right vaccine schedule, I need your child's birth date. Please share it like this: 2024-01-15 (year-month-day)
en.birthdate_confirmed: Thank you! I've saved your child's birth date as %BIRTHDATE%. I'll remind you about upcoming vaccines. Remember to bring your Road-to-Health book to the clinic.
en.birthdate_invalid: I didn't understand that date. Please write it like this: 2024-01-15 (year-month-day)
en.reminder_message:
â° REMINDER: Your child has a vaccination due on %VACCINE_DATE% for %VACCINE_NAME%.

Bring your Road-to-Health book to the clinic.

Any questions? Just ask me!

en.data_privacy: ğŸ”’ Your information is safe with me. I only use your child's birth date to send you vaccine reminders. All data is protected under POPIA (South African privacy law).

birth.description: First vaccines to protect against TB and polio

6_weeks.description: Important vaccines for polio, rotavirus, and other diseases

af.welcome:
Hallo! Ek is Suster Botina. Ek help ouers met kinderinentings in Suid-Afrika.

Ek kan jou help met:
â€¢ Inligting oor entstowwe
â€¢ Jou kind se inentingskedule
â€¢ Antwoorde op jou vrae
â€¢ Emosionele ondersteuning

Waarmee kan ek jou help?
af.error_message: Jammer, ek ondervind tans probleme. Probeer asseblief oor 'n oomblik weer.
af.ask_birthdate: Om jou die regte inentingskedule te gee, benodig ek jou kind se geboortedatum. Deel dit asseblief so: 2024-01-15 (jaar-maand-dag)
af.birthdate_confirmed: Dankie! Ek het jou kind se geboortedatum gestoor as %BIRTHDATE%. Ek sal jou herinner oor komende inentings. Onthou om jou Pad-na-Gesondheid boek kliniek toe te bring.
af.birthdate_invalid: Ek het nie daardie datum verstaan nie. Skryf dit asseblief so: 2024-01-15 (jaar-maand-dag)
af.reminder_message:
â° HERINNERING: Jou kind het 'n inenting op %VACCINE_DATE% vir %VACCINE_NAME%.

Bring jou Pad-na-Gesondheid boek kliniek toe.

Enige vrae? Vra gerus!
af.emergency_contacts:
ğŸ¥ NOODNOMMERS

ğŸš¨ Lewensgevaarlike noodgevalle:
ğŸ“ 10177

ğŸš‘ ER24:
ğŸ“ 084 124

ğŸš‘ Netcare 911:
ğŸ“ 082 911

â˜ï¸ Gesondheidsadvies (gratis):
ğŸ“ 0800 029 999
af.website_info:
Besoek ons webwerf vir meer hulp:
https://sister-botina-companion-app-744.created.app/

Jy kan klinieke vind en by ons ouergemeenskap aansluit!
af.data_privacy: ğŸ”’ Jou inligting is veilig by my. Ek gebruik net jou kind se geboortedatum om jou inentingsherinneringe te stuur. Alle data word beskerm onder POPIA (Suid-Afrikaanse privaatheidsreg).

birth.description: Eerste entstowwe om teen TB en polio te beskerm

6_weeks.description: Belangrike entstowwe vir polio, rotavirus en ander siektes

zu.welcome:
Sawubona! NginguSister Botina. Ngisiza abazali ngokugoma kwezingane eNingizimu Afrika.

Ngingakusiza ngalokhu:
â€¢ Ulwazi mayelana nemigomo
â€¢ Isheduli yokugoma yengane yakho
â€¢ Ukuphendula imibuzo yakho
â€¢ Ukwesekwa ngokomzwelo

Yini ongithanda ukuyazi?
zu.error_message: Ngiyaxolisa, nginenkinga manje. Sicela uzame futhi emizuzwini embalwa.
zu.ask_birthdate: Ukuze ngikuphe isheduli yokugoma efanele, ngidinga usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho. Sicela ulwabelane ngalo kanje: 2024-01-15 (unyaka-inyanga-usuku)
zu.birthdate_confirmed: Ngiyabonga! Ngigcine usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho njengo-%BIRTHDATE%. Ngizokukhumbuza ngokugoma okuzayo. Khumbula ukuletha incwadi yakho ye-Road-to-Health emtholampilo.
zu.birthdate_invalid: Angiqondi lelo suku. Sicela ulibhale kanje: 2024-01-15 (unyaka-inyanga-usuku)
zu.reminder_message:
â° ISIKHUMBUZI: Ingane yakho inokugoma ngo-%VACCINE_DATE% kwe-%VACCINE_NAME%.

Letha incwadi yakho ye-Road-to-Health emtholampilo.

Unemibuzo? Ngibuze nje!
zu.emergency_contacts:
ğŸ¥ IZINOMBOLO ZESIMO ESIPHUTHUMAYO

ğŸš¨ Izimo eziphuthumayo eziyingozi empilweni:
ğŸ“ 10177

ğŸš‘ ER24:
ğŸ“ 084 124

ğŸš‘ Netcare 911:
ğŸ“ 082 911

â˜ï¸ Izeluleko zezempilo (mahhala):
ğŸ“ 0800 029 999
zu.website_info:
Vakashela iwebhusayithi yethu ukuze uthole usizo olwengeziwe:
https://sister-botina-companion-app-744.created.app/

Ungathola imitholampilo futhi ujoyine umphakathi wabazali bethu!
zu.data_privacy: ğŸ”’ Ulwazi lwakho luphephile nami. Ngisebenzisa kuphela usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho ukukuthumelela izikhumbuzi zokugoma. Yonke imininingwane ivikelwe ngaphansi kwe-POPIA (umthetho wobumfihlo waseNingizimu Afrika).

6_weeks.description: Imigomo ebalulekile yepoliyo, rotavirus nezinye izifo

xh.welcome:
Molo! NdinguSister Botina. Ndinceda abazali ngokugonya kwabantwana eMzantsi Afrika.

Ndingakunceda ngoku:
â€¢ Ulwazi malunga nezithinteli
â€¢ Ishedyuli yokugonya yomntwana wakho
â€¢ Ukuphendula imibuzo yakho
â€¢ Inkxaso yeemvakalelo

Yintoni ofuna ukuyazi?
xh.error_message: Uxolo, ndinengxaki ngoku. Nceda uzame kwakhona kwakamsinyane.
xh.ask_birthdate: Ukuze ndikunike ishedyuli efanelekileyo yokugonya, ndifuna umhla wokuzalwa womntwana wakho. Nceda uwabelane ngalo ngolu hlobo: 2024-01-15 (unyaka-inyanga-usuku)
xh.birthdate_confirmed: Enkosi! Ndigcine umhla wokuzalwa womntwana wakho njengo-%BIRTHDATE%. Ndiza kukukhumbuza ngokugonya okuzayo. Khumbula ukuzisa incwadi yakho ye-Road-to-Health ekliniki.
xh.birthdate_invalid: Andiqondi loo mhla. Nceda uwubhale ngolu hlobo: 2024-01-15 (unyaka-inyanga-usuku)
xh.reminder_message:
â° ISIKHUMBUZO: Umntwana wakho unokugonya ngo-%VACCINE_DATE% kwe-%VACCINE_NAME%.

Zisa incwadi yakho ye-Road-to-Health ekliniki.

Unemibuzo? Ndibuze nje!
xh.emergency_contacts:
ğŸ¥ IINOMBOLO ZONGXAMISEKO

ğŸš¨ Iimeko eziphuthumayo eziyingozi ebomini:
ğŸ“ 10177

ğŸš‘ ER24:
ğŸ“ 084 124

ğŸš‘ Netcare 911:
ğŸ“ 082 911

â˜ï¸ Iingcebiso zempilo (simahla):
ğŸ“ 0800 029 999
xh.website_info:
Ndwendwela iwebhusayithi yethu ukuze ufumane uncedo olongezelelweyo:
https://sister-botina-companion-app-744.created.app/

Ungafumana iikliniki kwaye uzimanyane noluntu lwabazali bethu!
xh.data_privacy: ğŸ”’ Ulwazi lwakho lukhuselekile nam. Ndisebenzisa kuphela umhla wokuzalwa womntwana wakho ukukuthumelela izikhumbuzo zokugonya. Lonke idatha ikhuselwe phantsi kwe-POPIA (umthetho wabucala waseMzantsi Afrika).

6_weeks.description: Izithinteli ezibalulekileyo zepoliyo, rotavirus kunye nezinye izifo
